text: Any person aggrieved by any final decision or order of the Mayor denying, suspending, or revoking any license or renewal of a license issued or applied for under this chapter may obtain a review of the decision pursuant to § 2- 510.
historical:

DC CODE § 3-410

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: District of Columbia Boards and Commissions. (Refs & Annos)
